properties.Name: JointMarketingAgreement

Columns.Name: ContractId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Contract.

Columns.Name: AgreementDate
Columns.Description: The date that the agreement is to become effective.

Columns.Name: ProductSection
Columns.Description: The product(s) that will be addressed by the joint marketing agreement.

Columns.Name: GeneralDutiesSection
Columns.Description:
The responsibilities of each party are specifically defined such as:

-  Promotions
-  Mailings
-  Demo products
-  Sample products

Columns.Name: SpecificDutiesSection
Columns.Description:
The specific responsibilities of each party adjunct to the general responsibilities specified in the General Duties Section.

Examples:

-  Cost sharing
-  Training
-  Advertising splits
-  Press releases

Columns.Name: ConfidentialitySection
Columns.Description: This section specifies that plans, customers etc. are confidential and neither party will disclose such information without written permission from the other party.

Columns.Name: ConflictingMarketingSection
Columns.Description: This section specifies that neither party will form a similar joint marketing effort with a competitor within a specified time.

Columns.Name: TermAndAgreementTerminationSection
Columns.Description: This section specifies the length of the agreement and the terms under which the agreement may be terminated.

Columns.Name: SeverabilitySection
Columns.Description: This section specifies that in the condition that a section of the agreement is found to be invalid, the rest of the agreement will be in effect.

Columns.Name: AssignabilitySection
Columns.Description: This section specifies whether or not either party may assign any or all rights or obligations under the contract to a third party.
